overview:
A Sun-Certified Java Professional, Peeyush S. has worked on numerous projects based on the J2EE framework. He was responsible for developing various applications and Web sites based on Java across numerous domains.

He received his masterâ€™s degree in computer applications from Mahatma Gandhi University.

Peeyush has five years of experience in the software industry, bolstered by his experience in team leadership at Zerone Consulting Pvt. Ltd.
